# Build your Proximity Verifier

## Overview

The EUDI Proximity Verifier App is part of the EUDI Reference Implementation for ISO 18013-5 proximity-based credential verification. It is built with Kotlin Multiplatform (KMP/CMP), but it currently supports only Android implementation, while iOS implementation will follow as indicated in the [EUDI Wallet Reference Implementation Roadmap](https://github.com/orgs/eu-digital-identity-wallet/projects/24){:target="_blank"}.
